disruptions.title: Roadworks
disruptions.description:
Due to roadworks on the Solihull Station approach, there will be the following bus alterations.

Service 1S

Heading towards King Edwards School
Buses will enter the station via Streetsbrook Road, serve stop C, continue along Station Approach to Blossomfield Road, then use Lode Lane roundabout to rejoin the normal line of route.

Heading towards Solihull Station
Buses will divert from Streetsbrook roundabout via Streetsbrook Road and terminate at the station.

Service 4a

Heading towards Birmingham

Buses will divert from Station Road via Streetsbrook roundabout, Streetsbrook Road and continue the normal line of route. Buses heading towards Birmingham will be unable to serve Solihull Station.

Heading towards Solihull
Buses will follow the normal line of route and Solihull Station will be served as normal.

When

31 March - 1 May 2025

More information

There is more information on our special webpage.
disruptions.subtitle: Solihull Station

disruptions.title: Stop closed for VLR installation works
disruptions.description:
Whats Happening?
Because of the installation for the test track for the Coventry VLR (Very Light Rail) trial, stop GR2 in Greyfriars Road will be suspended, and services moved onto two temporary stops on Warwick Road.

When
Sunday 2nd February - Friday 19th September

Services affected & new stopping locations
NX Coventry 9, 9s, 11, 17, 17a, 21, 21a and Stagecoach 87, X18 and X18A

NX Coventry 17, 17a, 21, 21a and Stagecoach X18 and X18a will unload ONLY at stop TP1 on Warwick Road
To board these services please use BY1 in New Union Street for 17, 17a, 21, and 21a and BY3 for X18 and X18a

NX Coventry 9, 9s and 11 and Stagecoach 87 will pick up at stop TP2 on Warwick Road towards the Rail Station just after the roundabout at the junction of Greyfriars Road
disruptions.subtitle: Stop GR2, Greyfriars Road, Coventry City Centre

Towards Merry Hill; using Henderson Way and Beet St to enter Blackheath and using the Birmingham Rd Stop. Unable to serve Blackheaht Market, and Sainsbury's.

13A: NXWM
Will be using the Temporary Bus Stops on Archer Way as unable to enter the Town Centre. 

14: Diamond Buses

Buses will be diverted via Foley Drive, Queensway, Wolverhampton Road, Pound Road, Grafton Road, Lansdowne Road and Hurst Green Road then normal line of route.

 

Towards Birmingham

Buses will be diverted via Hurst Green Road, Lansdowne Road, Grafton Road, Pound Road, Wolverhampton Road, Queensway and Foley Drive then normal line of route.

disruptions.title: Points Failure between Leamington Spa - Coventry
disruptions.description:
Points Failure between Leamington Spa - Coventry

Due to a points failure, services are unable to run between Leamington Spa and Coventry until further notice

Rail replacement road service will operate between Coventry and Leamington in both directions.  

Full details and alternative travel options can be found here: https://www.nationalrail.co.uk/service-disruptions/leamington-spa-20250417/?utm_source=Twitter&utm_medium=social&utm_campaign=Orlo
disruptions.subtitle: null
